get.description:
Hotel Auto Suggest V2
=====================

Will provide possible search parameters dependent on the parameters given using the endpoint `getAutoSuggestV2`.

parameters.name: string
parameters.description: Search string that will enable a list of selection to be listed to the traveller.

parameters.name: max_results
parameters.description: Number passed is the maximum number of results returned.

parameters.name: get_airports
parameters.description: Include airports in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: get_cities
parameters.description: Include cities in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: get_regions
parameters.description: Include Regions in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: get_pois
parameters.description: Include Points of Interest in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: get_hotels
parameters.description: Include hotels in search results. Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: show_all_cities
parameters.description: Will filter out cities with no hotels. Valid Options: False = filter out cities without hotels, True = show cities with and without hotels.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Method of sorting the results. Valid options: rank, name

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Method of ordering the results of the search.  Valid options: asc or desc.

parameters.name: spellcheck
parameters.description: Enables the spell check option for the search string using either true or false.

parameters.name: combine_regions
parameters.description: If combine_regions is true, there will be regions data in the cityData array that is returned.  Valid Options: True or False

airport_spell.title: The Airport_spell Schema
airport_spell.description: Airport Spelling Types. The first item in the array will be the IATA spelling and the second item will be the airport's full spelling.

3.value: Winnipeg J A Richardson Intl Airport

property_description.example: Freebies include an airport shuttle and Wi-Fi, and guests can take a dip all year round in the indoor pool and hot tub at the non-smoking Sandman Hotel and Suites, near the Winnipeg Airport. Traditional rooms supply free Wi-Fi and 42-inch flat-panel TVs at the mid-rise, non-smoking Sandman Hotel. Some of the 210 rooms also feature fully equipped kitchenettes, sofa beds or jetted tubs. Two on-site restaurants include a Denny's, which is open 24 hours a day and offers room service, and a steakhouse. The business and fitness centers keep guests focused, and the indoor pool and hot tub are perfect ways to unwind. Extra pluses include a 24-hour front desk and available parking. Pets are allowed for an extra fee. Right on the bus line, the Sandman Hotel is less than four miles from downtown Winnipeg and about a mile from Winnipeg James Armstrong Richardson International Airport. Golfers have their choice of courses, with at least six less than a half-hour from the hotel. On the banks of the Red River, downtown Winnipeg offers something for everyone at Assiniboine Park, a green space that provides a playground, conservatory, zoo and concert venue. Other attractions in Winnipeg include the Forks National Historic Site, the Canadian Museum for Human Rights and the Royal Canadian Mint.

hotels.property_description: Freebies include an airport shuttle and Wi-Fi, and guests can take a dip all year round in the indoor pool and hot tub at the non-smoking Sandman Hotel and Suites, near the Winnipeg Airport. Traditional rooms supply free Wi-Fi and 42-inch flat-panel TVs at the mid-rise, non-smoking Sandman Hotel. Some of the 210 rooms also feature fully equipped kitchenettes, sofa beds or jetted tubs. Two on-site restaurants include a Denny's, which is open 24 hours a day and offers room service, and a steakhouse. The business and fitness centers keep guests focused, and the indoor pool and hot tub are perfect ways to unwind. Extra pluses include a 24-hour front desk and available parking. Pets are allowed for an extra fee. Right on the bus line, the Sandman Hotel is less than four miles from downtown Winnipeg and about a mile from Winnipeg James Armstrong Richardson International Airport. Golfers have their choice of courses, with at least six less than a half-hour from the hotel. On the banks of the Red River, downtown Winnipeg offers something for everyone at Assiniboine Park, a green space that provides a playground, conservatory, zoo and concert venue. Other attractions in Winnipeg include the Forks National Historic Site, the Canadian Museum for Human Rights and the Royal Canadian Mint.

A dinosaur-themed water park, an on-site restaurant, free Wi-Fi and a complimentary airport shuttle make the non-smoking Victoria Inn Airport a local favorite of our guests. The 260 non-smoking rooms at the five-story Victoria Inn Airport come with free Wi-Fi, a free newspaper, cable TV and a coffeemaker. The sizable conference center includes a business center, fitness center, game room, restaurant and sports bar, laundry facilities and secretarial services. Families will enjoy the dinosaur-themed water park. Pets are allowed. Parking and the 24-hour airport shuttle are free. The Victoria Inn Airport is a smart choice for business travelers, with Winnipeg International Airport just one mile away. Downtown Winnipeg's shopping and restaurants are less than four miles away. Assiniboine Park and Zoo are about five miles from the hotel. The Forks, a historic district with shops, dining, open spaces and cultural attractions, is about six miles away.

Easy access to the convention center, indoor and outdoor pools, and rooms with balconies keep our guests coming back to the non-smoking Delta Hotels By Marriott Winnipeg. The 393 rooms in the 17-story, non-smoking Delta Hotel feature free newspapers, balconies, heated bathroom floors, desks and coffeemakers. Guests will appreciate the huge fitness center, indoor pool, rooftop seasonal outdoor pool and business center. Wi-Fi is available. Dining options include a full-menu bistro and an English-style pub. Pets are allowed. Parking is available for a fee. Convenient for business travelers, the hotel is in downtown Winnipeg and connected by skywalk to the Winnipeg Convention Center. Nearby attractions include the MTS Centre, a five-minute walk, and the Manitoba Planetarium, a mile away. It's less than a mile to The Forks dining and culture district and six miles to Assiniboine Park and Zoo.  Winnipeg International Airport is four miles away.

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
    CURLOPT_URL => "{{ server }}/hotel/getAutoSuggestV2?format=json2&refid={{ refid }}&api_key={{ api_key }}&string=winni",
    CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
    CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
    CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
    CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
    CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
    CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
    CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
        "Cache-Control: no-cache"
    ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
    echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
    echo $response;
}

get.description:
Booking Details
=====================

Search up a reservation through email and booking ID to get the reservation's itinerary with the `getBookDetailsRequest` endpoint.

parameters.name: booking_id
parameters.description: The booking_id returned by the Get Express Book endpoint. Valid Options: `email` or `access_code` and `email`.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: additional_details
parameters.description: Provides cancellation details when toggled on. Valid Options: 0 = Exclude cancellation details, 1 = Include cancellation details

parameters.name: tracking_id
parameters.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Customer's email address which was used to make their booking.

hotel_name.title: The Hotel_name Schema
example: Millennium Broadway New York Times Square

data.title: The Category_0 Schema
data.example: Book Details

data.title: The Paragraph_0 Schema
data.example: #startFaqLink#Frequently Asked Questions#endFaqLink#

data.title: The Category_1 Schema
data.example: Book Details

data.title: The Title_1 Schema
data.example: Cancellation Policy

data.title: The Paragraph_1 Schema
data.example: Each room in this reservation is subject to the hotel's cancellation policy which is: Cancellations before 07/17/2018, 04:00 PM (America/New York) are fully refundable. Bookings cancelled after 07/17/2018, 04:00 PM (America/New York) are non-refundable. There is no refund for no-shows or early checkouts.

data.title: The Paragraph_2 Schema
data.example: If you don't check-in to the hotel on the first day of your reservation and do not alert the hotel in advance, the hotel reserves the right to cancel your reservation and may charge you a penalty.

data.title: The Title_4 Schema
data.example: Mandatory Fee Policy

data.title: The Paragraph_4 Schema
data.example: This hotel charges an additional USD 21.78. This fee will be charged to you directly by the hotel. Resort fees are not optional and typically cover items such as energy charges or safe fees. The amount of the charge is subject to change.

data.title: The Title_5 Schema
data.example: Customer Service

data.title: The Paragraph_5 Schema
data.example: If you have any questions about your booking, you can contact customer service at 1-855-850-0564. Please have your Trip Number R116766133 ready when calling.

data.title: The Category_0 Schema
data.example: Taxes And Fees

data.title: The Title_1 Schema
data.example: Taxes and Fees

data.title: The Paragraph_0 Schema
data.example:
In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction the charge to your debit or credit card will include a charge for Taxes and Fees.
                            This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including,
                            without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes.
                            In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel.
                            The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you.
                            The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs.
                            The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain.

data.title: The Paragraph_1 Schema
data.example:
Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors.
                            We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements.
                            Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

data.title: The Paragraph_2 Schema
data.example: For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your debit or credit card for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.

data.title: The Paragraph_3 Schema
data.example: Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax (GST) for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services.

data.title: The Paragraph_4 Schema
data.example: For this transaction, the amount you were charged relating to Taxes was $87.84 USD

data.title: The Paragraph_5 Schema
data.example: For this transaction, the amount you were charged for Service Fees was $0.00 USD

hotel.hotel_name: Millennium Broadway New York Times Square

important_information.data: Each room in this reservation is subject to the hotel's cancellation policy which is: Cancellations before 07/17/2018, 04:00 PM (America/New York) are fully refundable. Bookings cancelled after 07/17/2018, 04:00 PM (America/New York) are non-refundable. There is no refund for no-shows or early checkouts.
If you don't check-in to the hotel on the first day of your reservation and do not alert the hotel in advance, the hotel reserves the right to cancel your reservation and may charge you a penalty.

This hotel charges an additional USD 21.78. This fee will be charged to you directly by the hotel. Resort fees are not optional and typically cover items such as energy charges or safe fees. The amount of the charge is subject to change.
If you have any questions about your booking, you can contact customer service at 1-855-850-0564. Please have your Trip Number R116766133 ready when calling.

data.data: Taxes And Fees
Taxes and Fees

In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction the charge to your debit or credit card will include a charge for Taxes and Fees.
                            This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including,
                            without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes.
                            In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel.
                            The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you.
                            The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs.
                            The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain.

Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors.
                            We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements.
                            Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your debit or credit card for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.
Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax (GST) for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services.
For this transaction, the amount you were charged relating to Taxes was $87.84 USD
For this transaction, the amount you were charged for Service Fees was $0.00 USD

post.description:
Hotel Book Request
==================

Creates and emails a hotel reservation on success with the `getBookRequest` endpoint.

ppn_bundle.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that identifies a specific rate. `ppn_bundles` are provided by `getRates.Availability`

newsletter.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

newsletter_selected.description: Indicates if customer wants to subscribe to the email newsletter.

add_insurance.description: Insurance for booked product. Valid Options: 0 = No insurance, 1 = Insurance bought.

smoking.description: Smoking room preference for the customer.  Valid Options: 0 = No Preference, 1 = Non-Smoking, and 2 = Smoking.

comments.description: Comment by customer at time of booking.

sale_method.description: Type of device or call center flag. Valid Options: phn = Phone (Call Center), mlb = Mobile, dsk = Desktop.

device_type_id.description: Device type ID for sales tracking. Valid Options: 0 or 3 = Desktop , 1 = Mobile, 2 = Tablet, 4 = Phone.

tracking_id.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

refclickid.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

refclickid2.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

refclickid3.description: A custom field commonly used for tracking marketing attribution. Will appear in Google Analytics, and in reports with associated sales.

review_url.description: URL for a custom hotel itinerary lookup page.

contract_response.description: Option tracking values as a valid JSON string.  Values can include check in date, check out date and number of rooms.

allow_duplicate.description: Allow for duplicate bookings. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = True

nearby_limit.description: Number passed to limit nearby restaurants.

phone_agent.description: If a customer used a phone agent to book. Valid Options: 0 = No, 1 = Yes.

client_ip.description: Customer's IP address determined by your integration. Used by PPN for geo-location services and fraud prevention. Make sure you pass the customer's IP rather than your own. Currently only IPv4 addresses are accepted.

address_line_one.description: First line of card holder's address.

address_line_two.description: Second line of card holder's address.

address_postal_code.description: Card holder's zip or postal code.

address_state_code.description: Card holder's state or province code.

country_code.description: Two character country Alpha-2 ISO code.

email.description: Customer's email address to be associated with the booking. We'll use this email address for sending transaction email such as confirmations and cancellations.

ppn_bundle.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that identifies a specific rate. `ppn_bundles` are provided by `getRates.Availability`

get.description:
Hotel Contract Request
======================

Provides details on specified hotel and it's rate information using the `getHotelContractRequest` endpoint.

parameters.name: ppn_bundle
parameters.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that identifies a specific rate. `ppn_bundles` are provided by `getRates.Availability`

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: trackingid_value
parameters.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Hyphenated pair of two-character language and country codes. A subset of BCP47 format using only ISO639-1 alpha 2 language codes and ISO3166-1 alpha 2 country codes.

parameters.name: additional_details
parameters.description: Provides cancellation details when toggled on. Valid Options: 0 = Exclude cancellation details, 1 = Include cancellation details

parameters.name: rate_tracking_id
parameters.description: An ID used by Priceline Contracts to identify the contract's rate.

data.data: Taxes And Fees
Taxes and Fees

In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction the charge to your debit or credit card will include a charge for Taxes and Fees.
                                         This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including,
                                         without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes.
                                         In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel.
                                         The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you.
                                         The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs.
                                         The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain.

Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your debit or credit card for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.
Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax (GST) for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services.

2.data: Each room in this reservation is subject to the hotel's cancellation policy which is: Cancellations before 12/08/2018, 11:59 PM (America/Los Angeles) are fully refundable. Bookings cancelled after 12/08/2018, 11:59 PM (America/Los Angeles) are subject to a fee of 1 night's room and tax. There is no refund for no-shows, early checkouts, or cancellations after 12/10/2018, 10:00 AM (America/Los Angeles).

4.data: If you have any questions about your booking, you can contact customer service at 1-855-850-0564.

data.data: Taxes And Fees
Taxes and Fees

In connection with facilitating your hotel transaction the charge to your debit or credit card will include a charge for Taxes and Fees.
                                         This charge includes an estimated amount to recover the amount we pay to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes owed by the hotel including,
                                         without limitation, sales and use tax, occupancy tax, room tax, excise tax, value added tax and/or other similar taxes.
                                         In certain locations, the tax amount may also include government imposed service fees or other fees not paid directly to the taxing authorities but required by law to be collected by the hotel.
                                         The amount paid to the hotel in connection with your reservation for taxes may vary from the amount we estimate and include in the charge to you.
                                         The balance of the charge for Taxes and Fees is a fee we retain as part of the compensation for our services and to cover the costs of your reservation, including, for example, customer service costs.
                                         The charge for Taxes and Fees varies based on a number of factors including, without limitation, the amount we pay the hotel and the location of the hotel where you will be staying, and may include profit that we retain.

Except as described below, we are not the vendor collecting and remitting taxes to the applicable taxing authorities. Our hotel suppliers, as vendors, include all applicable taxes in the amount billed to us and we pay over such amounts directly to the vendors. We are not a co-vendor associated with the vendor with whom we book or reserve our customer's travel arrangements. Taxability and the appropriate tax rate and the type of applicable taxes vary greatly by location.

For transactions involving hotels located within certain jurisdictions, the charge to your debit or credit card for Taxes and Fees includes a payment of tax that we are required to collect and remit to the jurisdiction for tax owed on amounts we retain as compensation for our services.
Please note that we are unable to facilitate a rebate of Canadian Goods and Services Tax (GST) for customers booking Canadian hotel accommodations utilizing our services.

get.description:
Hotel Details
=============

Provides information on the specified hotel using the `getHotelDetails` endpoint.

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The PPN Hotel ID identifying the desired property.

parameters.name: check_in
parameters.description: Check In Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

parameters.name: check_out
parameters.description: Check Out Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

parameters.name: photos
parameters.description: Toggles photo data. By default, hotel photo data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: image_size
parameters.description: The size of the image returned.  Valid Options: small (60px), medium(300 to 312px) or large(500 to 800px).

parameters.name: reviews
parameters.description: Toggle hotel review data. By default, review data is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = On.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Toggle recent sales.  Valid Options: True, False

parameters.name: promo
parameters.description: Toggle the hotel's promo data on and off. By default, promo data is excluded in the response. To include promo data in the response, set `promo` to 1.

parameters.name: nearby
parameters.description:
Toggles nearby data. Nearby data is extra information regarding the specified hotel's location. Nearby data can include `city_data`, `airport_data`, and `poi_category_data`. 
            By default, nearby data is excluded from the response. To include nearby data, set `nearby` to `1`. 
            To include `city_data` within nearby data, include a `city_limit` parameter to a value greater than 1.  
            To include `airport_data` within nearby data, include a `airport_limit` parameter to a value greater than 1.
            To include `poi_category_data` within nearby data, include a `poi_limit` parameter to a value greater than 1.

parameters.name: plugins
parameters.description: Provides extra information regarding plugins for the specified hotel. To include specific plugin information, include the ID of the plugin as a comma separated value to the `plugins` parameter.

parameters.name: id_lookup
parameters.description: Allows non-PPN Hotel IDs to be searched in the database.  Valid Options: True or False

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: important_info
parameters.description: Toggles important info. Important info is extra details regarding the specified hotel. By default, important info is excluded in the response. Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: guest_score_breakdown
parameters.description: Toggle guest score breakdown on and off.  Valid Options: True or False

parameters.name: videos
parameters.description: Toggle videos.  Valid Options: True or False

hotel_description.title: The Hotel_description Schema
hotel_description.example: A 24-hour airport shuttle, a tasty complimentary breakfast and free internet access are a few good reasons to book La Quinta Inn & Suites LAX, say our guests. All 279 rooms in the 10-story hotel feature pillowtop mattresses and free high-speed internet access. Microwaves and mini-fridges are available by request. Wake up to a free waffle breakfast and/or a morning workout in the fitness center. Check your email in the business center or make a splash in the outdoor pool with sun deck. Grab snacks at the convenience store or dine at the on-site restaurant and lounge. Laundry facilities keep you looking sharp. Shuttle service is available to Manhattan Beach for a nominal fee. The 24-hour shuttle from the airport is complimentary. Parking on-site is available for an added fee. Pets are welcome. Located two miles from Los Angeles International Airport, La Quinta is close to fun in the sun. Drive six miles north to Villa Marina Marketplace and prime people watching on Venice Beach. Playa del Rey, a more laid-back beach, is four miles west. Watch the sunset from Santa Monica Pier eight miles northwest or window-shop on Rodeo Drive or Sunset Strip, both 20 minutes north. Downtown attractions, including the historic theater district, Museum of Contemporary Art, Staples Center and Chinatown, are 15 miles north.

review_data.bad_description: Pick up at airport took to long

review_data.good_description: Poor breakfast  renovations on both times of my booking problem during the dsy. Otherwise ok

Location is perfect for quick shuttle to the airport. Staff was very friendly and the lobby was nice. Liked having the restaurant as well however food was sub-par for the price. Seems like the hotel is under some kind of renovation - 6th floor had a "smell" to it and although the room was clean it was very "dated"
review_data.bad_description: The overall feel was that it was old and dirty once you get past the lobby and restaurant. Not sure what the other floors were like but we were on the 6th and it smelled like musty old house with construction work. It served it's purpose but they really need to keep the construction to one side or not book rooms on floors with construction.

review_data.good_description:
We were 4 colleagues travelling on business and needed one night stay to catch flight back from LAX. Proximity to LAX was a critical factor which was very well satisfied including that they had a free shuttle.
Breakfast was average nothing to rave about but just about adequate. The property is soon going to undergo major renovation, so wouldn't write it off!
review_data.bad_description:
However the room was inadequate for 4, and although it said there was an additional toilet and bath - it didn't so ended up booking another room on the spot - which was not anticipated.
I think as it is set up it is well suited for families and single business traveller.

It seemed a bit over priced. The night before I was in Berlin and stayed at the Mark Hotel. The room was essential the same but more than 50% less. The breakfast in LA didnt make up the difference in price.

review_data.good_description: Breakfast has a lot of variety of choices.
review_data.bad_description:
The front desk was a bit rude at first, But then he apologized. I think they should know that theyve jobs bc of guests like me.
I accepted his apology though.
All the banging. There was construction going on. I wish we would have known.
Menu including breakfast could be changed.

review_data.good_description:
The front desk agent (I believe her name is Angelica), was very helpful. 
The breakfast was surprisingly good.
review_data.bad_description:
The signage on the building could be improved (it's easy to miss the entrance)
The pillows were very uncomfortable (I strongly recommend Harris Pillows).
The air conditioner was very annoying since the fan was directed straight onto the bed.
Although the bathroom was clean, the items were arranged in a sloppy manner.

review_data.good_description: Breakfast, beds, rooms. All is great!!!
Convenient for USC football games and cycling along the coast. Beds were very comfy.
review_data.bad_description: Under renovation but that was why the price was good, and it really wasnt a problem.
Noise and loud on the roof,Dog barking in the room and the marijuana smells all over.

get.description:
Hotel Rates Live Multi
======================

Provides multiple live rates from Agoda, Booking, and Priceline per hotel using the `getRates.Live.Multi` endpoint.

parameters.name: check_in
parameters.description: Check In Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

parameters.name: check_out
parameters.description: Check Out Date (YYYY-MM-DD or MM/DD/YYYY)

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: images
parameters.description: A toggle to show if images are requested.  Valid Options: 0 = False, 1 = True

parameters.name: policies
parameters.description: A toggle to show if policies are on or off  Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On

parameters.name: additional_details
parameters.description: Provides cancellation details when toggled on. Valid Options: 0 = Exclude cancellation details, 1 = Include cancellation details

parameters.name: tracking_id
parameters.description: Used by PPN to link the flow of communication/information through our, and our partners', systems. Useful for debugging purposes as it allows us to reference all operations performed by an API request with a single unique ID.

parameters.name: field_blacklist
parameters.description: Comma separated list of elements to remove from API response. Useful to limit data transmission of unused data, for example removing amenity information (`field_blacklist=amenity_data`) can significantly reduce the size of the response.

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: Children ages from 1-17, there must be a children_ages[] field for each child. For Disney properties only.

parameters.name: sid
parameters.description: A unique value identifying a customer's session, to be passed into multiple endpoints. The same session ID should be passed for the duration of a customer's booking session. This value should be unique for each user session.

parameters.name: ppn_bundle
parameters.description: `ppn_bundle` is a unique ID that identifies a specific rate. `ppn_bundles` are provided by `getRates.Availability`

parameters.name: client_user_agent
parameters.description: The User-Agent header string from the customer's web browser or application. Valid Options: `Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_6), AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko), Chrome/68.0.3440.84 Safari/537.36`.
parameters.example: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_9_5) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/42.0.2311.90 Safari/537.36

parameters.name: hotel_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated string of PPN hotel ids (Semi Opaque Only)

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants

parameters.name: adults
parameters.description: The total number of adult occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `children` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: children
parameters.description: The total number of child occupants for all rooms requested. Used with `adults` parameter to determine occupancy. Example: Two rooms, each with one adult and one child occupants, `adults=2` and `children=2`

parameters.name: rate_tracking_id
parameters.description: An ID used by Priceline Contracts to identify the contract's rate.

parameters.name: partner_member_token
parameters.description: Unique token for partner members.

get.description:
Hotel Listings
========================

Provides hotel results with multiple rates per hotel using the `getResultsCacheV2` endpoint.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Requested currency for the results. ISO 4217 format.

parameters.name: children_ages
parameters.description: Children ages from 1-17, there must be a children_ages[] field for each child. For Disney properties only.

parameters.name: rooms
parameters.description: Number of rooms required for all occupants

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: Radius in miles the results are from

parameters.name: expand_radius
parameters.description: When on, the search radius will be increased automatically in the case where there are fewer than 20 properties in the response.  Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: recent
parameters.description: Toggle recent sales.  Valid Options: True, False

parameters.name: promo
parameters.description: Toggle the hotel's promo data on and off. By default, promo data is excluded in the response. To include promo data in the response, set `promo` to 1.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Sort results by guest score Valid Options: gs = guest_score, star rating = sr, low price = lp, high price = hp, distance = ds.

parameters.name: price_low
parameters.description: Filter results by display price, accepts a floating point value without currency. `price_low` is the lower bound of price filter and must be used with `price_high`.

parameters.name: price_high
parameters.description: Filter results by display price, accepts a floating point value without currency. `price_high` is the upper bound of price filter and must be used with `price_low`.

parameters.name: star_rating_low
parameters.description: Filter results by star rating, between 1 and 5 (inclusive). `star_rating_low` is the lower bound of star ratings and must be used with `star_rating_high`.

parameters.name: star_rating_high
parameters.description: Filter results by star rating, between 1 and 5 (inclusive). `star_rating_high` is the upper bound of star ratings and must be used with `star_rating_low`.

parameters.name: guest_low
parameters.description: Filter results by guest rating, between 1 and 10 (inclusive). `guest_low` is the lower bound of guest ratings and must be used with `guest_high`.

parameters.name: guest_high
parameters.description: Filter results by guest rating, between 1 and 10 (inclusive). `guest_high` is the upper bound of guest ratings and must be used with `guest_low`.

parameters.name: plugin_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated list of PPN Plugin IDs, used to alter the behaviour of the endpoint.

parameters.name: hotel_name
parameters.description: Filter results by property name. Any partial or full sting match will be included in the results. For example, `hotel_name=Best` will match all Best Western properties.

parameters.name: amenities
parameters.description: Comma separated list of PPN amenity codes.

parameters.name: field_blacklist
parameters.description: Comma separated list of elements to remove from API response. Useful to limit data transmission of unused data, for example removing amenity information (`field_blacklist=amenity_data`) can significantly reduce the size of the response.

parameters.name: rate_limit
parameters.description: Number passed to limit the number of rates returned. Defaults to returning all available rates

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used with `offset` to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the number of properties to return with each call.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used with `limit` to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the nuber of properties to skip (starting at 0) before returning results.

parameters.name: additional_details
parameters.description: Provides cancellation details when toggled on. Valid Options: 0 = Exclude cancellation details, 1 = Include cancellation details

parameters.name: source_photos
parameters.description: Toggle source photos on and off.  The source photo is the photo of the hotel that we get from the hotel.  Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: additional_hotel_details
parameters.description: Toggle additional hotel details on and off to display the property description.  Valid Options: True or False.

parameters.name: inventory_limit
parameters.description: Similar to `limit`, but limits properties before checking availability.

parameters.name: inventory_offset
parameters.description: Similar to `offset`, but offsets properties before checking availability.

parameters.name: distancefrom_airport
parameters.description: List each property's distance from the given 3-letter IATA airport code.

parameters.name: distancefrom_latlong
parameters.description: List each property's distance from the given latitude and longitude.

parameters.name: distancefrom_poi
parameters.description: List each property's distance from a point of interest, given as a PPN POI ID.

parameters.name: chain_logo
parameters.description: When on, a link to each property's chain logo will be included in the results when available.  Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: distance_unit
parameters.description: Convert distance in output from Miles to Kilometres. Defaults to Miles.  Valid Options: mi = miles, km = kilometers

parameters.name: featured_hotel_ids
parameters.description: PPN Hotel ID(s) to add to featured hotels in the results list

parameters.name: client_user_agent

parameters.name: region_id

policy_data.title: Cancellation Policy
paragraph_data: For the room type you've selected, you can cancel your reservation for a full refund up until noon on Friday, December 7th (local hotel time). If you decide to cancel your reservation anytime between noon on Friday, December 7th and noon on Monday, December 10th (local hotel time), the hotel requires payment for the first night's stay.  You will be charged for the first night's stay including taxes and fees.  Any remaining amount will be refunded to you. Refunds or cancellations are not available after noon local hotel time on your day of arrival (Monday, December 10th).  Refundable Until :2018-12-07 12:00:00

paragraph_data: Any cancellation received within 3 days prior to arrival date will incur the full period charge. Failure to arrive at your hotel or property will be treated as a No-Show and no refund will be given (Property policy). Refundable Until :2018-12-06 19:00:00

x-code-samples.source:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, [
    CURLOPT_URL => "{{ server }}/hotel/getResultsWithCacheV2?format=json2&refid={{ refid }}&api_key={{ api_key }}&airport_code=YWG",
    CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
    CURLOPT_ENCODING => "",
    CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
    CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 30,
    CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
    CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => "GET",
    CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => [
        "Cache-Control: no-cache"
    ],
]);

$response = curl_exec($curl);
$err = curl_error($curl);

curl_close($curl);

if ($err) {
    echo "cURL Error #:" . $err;
} else {
    echo $response;
}

get.description:
Hotel Reviews
=============

Displays the reviews for a specified hotel using the `getHotelReviews` endpoint.

parameters.name: hotel_id
parameters.description: The PPN Hotel ID identifying the desired property.

parameters.name: order_by
parameters.description: CSV of sorting order metrics.  Valid Options: creation_date, average_rating, or verified_guest followed by .asc or .desc.

parameters.name: only_verified_guests
parameters.description: Set on to only include only reviews with verified_guests.  A verified guest is a guest that has had a review verified by aaa.  Valid Options: 0 = Off, 1 = On.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Used with `offset` to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the number of properties to return with each call.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Used with `limit` to only retrieve a subset of all results at a time. Determines the nuber of properties to skip (starting at 0) before returning results.

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: This is a booking.com inventory only field that allows you to filter results by a csv of language codes you pass in,

getHotelReviews.title: Response Object
getHotelReviews.description: The standard response from the server

status_code.description:
Error Codes

Status Code Message
1.822.1 Hotel.Reviews: hotel_id must be numeric.
1.822.2 Hotel.Reviews: Limit must be numeric.
1.822.3 Hotel.Reviews: Offset must be numeric.
1.822.4 Hotel.Reviews: Applayer filter is not set.
1.822.5 Hotel.Reviews: All inventories disabled.
1.822.6 Hotel.Reviews: Hotel information not found.
1.822.8 Hotel.Reviews: No reviews found as Offset value exceeds the number of reviews.
1.822.9 Hotel.Reviews: order_by is not valid.
1.822.10 Hotel.Reviews: Languages must be a csv of language abbreviations ex/ en,fr.

review_data.good_description: The staff was awesome and it was cozy.
review_data.bad_description: If I was a big person, I would not be able to fit into the room.  I did find one a little bit closer to where I needed.  A little bit cheaper price twice the size of the room.  Just as good in my book.

I arrived to the property, checked in and went to sleep. I was woken up at 3am by two random strangers in my bedroom, the hotel had mistakenly double booked the room. In the morning I checked out without an apology from staff, to then be chased down the street saying I needed to pay an extra $15. When asked why they stated the room I was given by mistake was someone elses and they had undercharged me- not once did they apologize or attempt to rectify the situation. DO NOT stay here!
Berbat bir otel puanlama derecesine bakmayn.  Aldklar paray hak etmiyorlar.
Se faire virer pour avoir seulement enlever le dtecteur de fum
